categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Eben Figueiredo is a British actor and singer-songwriter. He was born circa 1996 and lives in London, England. Figueiredo trained at Bristol Old Vic, an acting company. In 2018, he portrayed an Imperial mudtrooper in Solo: A Star Wars Story. Figueiredo joined the cast of Solo after auditioning for and coming close to a variety of roles with UK casting director Nina Gold. He was ultimately cast as an Imperial mudtrooper along with two other actors, Shaquille Ali-Yebuah and Aaron Heffernan. The three mudtrooper actors spent about a month filming their scenes in Solo: A Star Wars Story.
